title: Skirt
description: wide (6\") blue waistband (double); long hand stitched ties; tiny accordian pleated blue batik with horizontal bands; in approx. middle random pattern applied multicolored embroidery and brown patches; narrow braided tape holds pleats
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
